title: Silver Canyon
description: A TROUBLED TOWN, A DEADLY SECRETâ Youâ re not wanted in Hattanâ s Point,â Matt Brennan was told moments after arriving in town. â Thereâ s trouble here and men are picking sides.â But Matt decided he wasnâ t going anywhere. Not until he found out what the dispute was about, and not before he got to know Moira Maclaren. She considered him nothing more than a drifting ranch hand, but Matt was determined to prove her wrong. To do so, heâ d have to solve a mystery that was at the center of the growing violence in Hattanâ s Pointâ a secret that could make a man rich . . . or dead. Probably dead.
author: Louis L'Amour
